mapper.select: SELECT b.branch_id, p.branch_tp, b.branch_nm, b.branch_addr, b.tel, b.lat, b.lng, i.branch_img, (SELECT MAX(c1.classroom_nm) FROM classroom c1 WHERE c1.branch_id = b.branch_id) AS classroom_nm FROM branch_type p JOIN branch b ON p.branch_tp_id = b.branch_tp_id JOIN branch_image i ON b.branch_id = i.branch_id WHERE b.branch_id = #{branch_id}
